H4397.def: = a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H5782.def: = process by which someone wakes up from his sleep

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H4501.def: = stand ► designed to hold one or more lamps so that the lamps can light a large area

H1543.def: = a round, deep dish or basin for the storage of liquids

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H4166.def: exact meaning unsure: = relatively narrow projection in the shape of a lip ◄ on one side of an oil lamp; ► location of the wick

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H2132.def: = tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; its leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; its fruit is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than 1 cm. thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; ► its fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and for anointing; ≈  regarded as beautiful and associated with well-being

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3225.def: = the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

H8040.def: = the side of the human body which is to the north when facing the direction of the rising sun; in extension: one option as opposed to another

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}

H3581.def: = state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}

H4334.def: = an area of fairly level, high ground; ≈ sometimes associated with a lack of obstacles, both literally and figuratively

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H68.def: = hard, heavy, and strong substance, ◄ very commonly found in nature,  ► which can be hewn into different shapes by a craftsman

H7222.def: = exact meaning unsure; literally: head stone; hence: = the highest stone in a construction, which, in this context, may either refer to the foundation of a previous construction on which a new construction is to be erected, or to the capstone that completes a new construction

H8663.def: = action by which humans speak loudly

H2580.def: = state in which someone or something is physically attractive; ► which may bring about a favorable attitude in others

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
